website_summaries.verdict: This system is great for public use. It can hold up to 1,000 fingerprints.
pros: Can take wet or dry fingerprints
Comes with an interior Exit button for emergencies
Comes with 10 cards and key cards
cons: This is a magnetic lock and not a deadbolt lock, but it is built to withstand 600 lb

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things!
customer_reviews.text: I have this system installed on my commercial building with the keypad outside and thus far it has worked fine. It does go crazy if a dirty fingerprint is used and the sun hits the fingerprint reader directly. A few issues: (1)install is difficult because its a chinese to english translation that doesn't make much sense, however the companies customer support is good. (2) One person can't have all forms of access, fingerprint, card, token, password (3) The fingerprint pad doesn't like direct sunlight
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I bought TWO of thse several months ago.. and although I was so busy i did not have time to install it...when i finally did I regret not having done it sooner. It is on a hidden safe of mine, so i had to build it in with additional brackets. But it was so easy to install. It came with a disc that has very good instructions. Once set up... the functionality is VERY good...and the unit looks so professional. Could not be happier. GREAT product.
customer_reviews.author: David Ridings

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 5 stars for the price. The instructions are difficult and do not explain that you need a universal plug-in for the 2 red wires for the power supply. Luckily those are only $2 at home depot. Will give an update on how the system holds up at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: Steven  Collins

customer_reviews.title: Dont - just dont buy it unless you want to suffer for a few hours
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is cheap, the mount is flimsy, after install if you push the cover up it falls from mount. The glue that holds the glass is crap, it dried off and the glass fell off. Programming is a nightmare. The usb is utterly useless.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This works just as advertised. The installation was not difficult. Just make sure you have a diagram before proceeding. So far i am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb Access Control System
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product and the seller has been on point with support and guidance; they even had an API setup for me so that I can write my software controls around the system. I would highly recommend both the seller and their products, they stand-by them and are amazing people to work with.
customer_reviews.author: BFS G.

customer_reviews.title: Very quick and easy to add more people and the installation was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and all cards/fobs are working too. Very quick and easy to add more people and the installation was a breeze. I had a little trouble at the start to get the card to work and did not realize it had to be held over the key pad so it was my fault not the product.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID FINLAYSON

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The lock works great! I installed this for a room in my home. I got stuck at one point in the install and emailed their customer support on a Saturday and they called and emailed me back within 5 minutes and had a solution that fixed where I was stuck. I recommend this product and absolutely recommend the sellers!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Needed an access control solution for a new building we've recently moved into. I was a little intimidated that the wiring would be beyond me but for the price, I was willing to give it a shot. The install documentation needs work but the seller is so good about returning emails and helping out in general that I had no problems getting this unit working. I also added the PIR sensor to facilitate people exiting the building.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Moon

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This product is really nice. It was easy to install and is better quality than I thought I would get for the price. I had an issue with the RFID card reader (user error) I got a response to my email very fast and had the problem corrected very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This was installed as a stand alone unit. After following all instructions I still had a minor issue with the unit locking. I was able to reach out to the seller with minimal delay who quickly knew exactly what the issue was. From start to finish, this unit was operational within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: David Peachey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: easy to install if you are guided by the instruction .Will recommend to other business as well.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Got it on time works great and looks very pro.
customer_reviews.author: Yuval Beton

customer_reviews.title: If you need a biometric electromagnetic lock, then look no further.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and well packaged. However not only is this a fantastic product the customer service is top notch. They stand by their product, and had support doing a video call on skype to walk me through it. I will definitely be making more purchases of their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: scott devoe

customer_reviews.title: don't buy too easy to pick
customer_reviews.text: This lock is useless, look up [1040] Fingerprint/RFID Lock Defeated With a Paperclip on you tube and weatch it get opened with only a paper clip. Useless lock.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Fun

customer_reviews.title: RFID access
customer_reviews.text: Can somebody help me out... I just buy them last year 2 of them are keep on and off
customer_reviews.author: Jammal

product_meta.title: Full Kits Biometric Fingerprint RFID Password Access Control Systems + 600lbs Force Electric EM Magnetic Lock +110V Power Supply+10 Cards and Key Fobs
feature_bullets: Easy Install and wire, Provide Detail video guide and On-line support for any question, Can check video before purchase.
Indoor Fingerprint Access Control Device with Color screen, Support Fingerprint or RFID card or Password, completely running stand alone, Also Support RJ45 cable to download Entry Records.
Fingerprint Sensor with quality image, accepts dry, wet fingers; 600lbs Indoor Electric Magnetic Lock with LED; 3,000 Users Capacity
Professional access control, time profile access support. 600LBS Magnetic Lock
Pleasse only install in In-Door environment, Suitable for the entrances and exits of appartment, multi-family houses, office, factory, hotel, school, etc.
